title: Mexican bean, pepper and sweetcorn salad
ingredients: ['1 (400g) tin black beans, rinsed and drained', '1 (400g) tin kidney beans, drained', '1 (400g) tin cannellini beans, drained and rinsed', '1 green pepper, chopped', '1 red pepper, chopped', '300g frozen sweetcorn kernels', '1 red onion, chopped', '125ml olive oil', '125ml red wine vinegar', '2 tablespoons fresh lime juice', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '2 tablespoons caster sugar', '1 tablespoon salt', '1 clove crushed garlic', '4 tablespoons chopped fresh coriander', '1/2 tablespoon ground cumin', '1/2 tablespoon ground black pepper', '1 dash hot chilli sauce', '1/2 teaspoon chilli powder']
